name: SteamBurnerInster
title: Steam and Burner Filter Update
author: Bouncebag
description:
Adds Steam Filter Inserter, Steam Stack Inserter, Steam Stack Filter Inserter, plus, Burner Stack Inserter, Burner Stack Filter Inserter.
If Burner Filter Inserter mod is active will update it to Bob's Mod updates for the basic Burner Filter
Graphics not properly done. Uses graphics from Bob's Logistics/base game/any other mod that modifies inserter that this extends from.
Requires: Factorio, Bob's Logistics mod by Bobingabout
Optionally: Burner Filter Inserter by V453000
